savers

Class DataSaver_Dense

  • java.lang.Object
    • savers.DataSaver_Dense
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSaver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataSaver_DenseJava, DataSaver_DenseTFRecord

    public abstract class DataSaver_Dense
extends Object
implements IDataSaver
    Saving to file with full state and action data at every timestep. Data formatting and crunching into a file is handled by inheriting classes. This only covers the basic data collection from Negotiator.
    Author:
    matt

        public void reportTimestep(Action action,
                           GameThreadSafe game)
        Description copied from interface: IDataSaver
        Report intermediate nodes as they are being run. Useful for dense saving of data for TFRecords or other.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        action - Current action being run.
        game - Instance of the game used for simulation.
